unix.name: Set primary DNS to localhost IPv4 address
unix.command: sudo nmcli con mod eth0 ipv4.dns '127.0.0.1'

unix.name: Set secondary DNS to localhost IPv6 address
unix.command: sudo nmcli con mod eth0 ipv6.dns '::1'

unix.name: Change MAC address to all zeros
Close pings
unix.command: sudo iptables -A OUTPUT -p icmp --icmp-type echo-request -j DROP

windows.name: Assign IPv4 localhost address
windows.command: netsh interface ipv4 set address name="Ethernet" static 127.0.0.1

windows.name: Assign IPv6 localhost address
windows.command: netsh interface ipv6 set address name="Ethernet" static ::1

windows.name: Set primary DNS to IPv4 localhost address
windows.command: netsh interface ipv4 set dns name="Ethernet" source=static addr=127.0.0.1 register=none

windows.name: Set secondary DNS to IPv6 localhost address
windows.command: netsh interface ipv6 set dns name="Ethernet" source=static addr=::1 register=none

windows.name: Change hostname to IPv4 localhost address
Change MAC address to all zeros
Close pings
windows.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Block ICMP" protocol=icmpv4:any,any action=block

windows.name: Block all ingress traffic
windows.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles firewallpolicy blockinbound
